ElementMozMousePixelScroll_event.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The Firefox-only, non-standard, and obsolete MozMousePixelScroll event is fired at an asynchronously when a mouse wheel or similar device is operated. It's represented by the interface.

blockquote.para: Note: Do not use this non-standard and obsolete event. Instead, you should always use the standard event.

remarks.para:
-
-Gecko's legacy line or page scroll event: DOMMouseScroll
-Non-Gecko browsers' legacy mouse wheel event: mousewheel
-Standardized wheel event: wheel
